title: After Practice, It Has to Be This!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Hnn! Nothing beats ice cream after practice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Mikan ice cream really refreshes your tired body zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I went with matcha ice cream. Matcha has a rich taste and is soothing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hey, hey, my banana ice cream is really tasty, so Rin wants you guys to try it nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Then.... *munch*.... it’s delicious! Isn’t it, Hanamaru-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeah, it’s good! This is the taste of happiness zura~. Rin-chan, Shioriko-chan, go ahead and take a bite out of mine as well.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Then, please also try mine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>....So good~~~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>....So good~~~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>....So good~~~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Fufu. It’s nice how we can get 3 different flavors when there are three of us. If there’s another opportunity, I’d like to buy the strawberry one. I had a hard time deciding between it and matcha. Please accompany me again for ice cream after practice sometimes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>It doesn’t have to be next time, we can just get it now, right? Maru still wants to eat some ice cream, so let’s go buy the strawberry one zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ah, me too! Rin will go with the soda flavor nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eeeh, can the two of you eat that much!? Hanamaru-saaan, Rin-saaan! Please waaait~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
